name: Gifttrekk
description:
All th presents of the world fell out of the sleigh, it's ypur job to get them all back before christmas!

//The game isn't scaled properly for anyting other than 16:9

Controls:

WASD for movement

SPACE to drop a present

E to pick up a dropped present while it is targeted

Restart a level by pressing R

Hold ESCAPE to quit the game at any time
